caption.p: Cytotoxicity of tested lavender oils. ( A) Cell viability assay (MTT) was performed after 24 h incubation of HaCaT cells with designated concentrations ( v/ v) of commercial or in-house preparation of lavender oil. Values are mean ± SD. Groups were compared to the control, and statistical analysis was performed using GraphPad Prism and build-in ANOVA test. p-values ≤ 0.05 were considered significant. ***— p ≤ 0.001; ****— p ≤ 0.0001. ( B) IC50% values were interpolated as lavender oil concentration required for the 50% reduction in cell viability. The data represent mean ± SD between four replicates. Statistical significance was evaluated using a t-test. ***— p ≤ 0.001.
